title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in Clinton, NC | Kosterman Chiropractic Center
description: Mind Body Connection in Clinton, NC. Kosterman Chiropractic Center is your local Chiropractor in Clinton serving all of your needs. Call us today at (910) 592-2250 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
